text: Air Koryo is a North Korean airline. Its headquarters is in Pyongyang. The hub is at Pyongyang International Airport. Air Koryo was also banned in European Union between 2006 to 2020. Also due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Air Koryo cancelled most of the flights between 2020 to 2023. Category:Airlines of Asia Category:Organizations based in North Korea Category:Pyongyang
title: Air Koryo
